message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the application of deep learning techniques for affective computing in text-based emotion recognition. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also extensively discusses the use of recurrent neural networks and transfer learning, which are common techniques in the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also deals with information retrieval and decision support, which are relevant to the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper discusses the implications of affective computing, which could be relevant to the sub-category of cs.CY (Computers and Society).
